Description: being an employer within the meaning of the Health & Safety at Work etc. Act 1974 [“the Act”] they did contravene Regulation 11(1) of the Provision and Use of Work Equipment Regulations 1998 in that they failed to ensure that measures were taken in accordance with paragraph (2) of the Regulations which were effective to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the pulley of the Vacuum Optical Coating Plant Number 36, whereby they are guilty of an offence contrary to Section 33(1)(c) of the Act
